title: BrAPI Workshop At PAG32
description:
Join us in San Diego at PAG32 for a BrAPI community workshop. There will be six BrAPI community speakers presenting on various BrAPI projects.

Can't make it on Saturday? Don't worry, BrAPI representatives will be wandering around the convention center all week. Reach out to a BrAPI Coordinator to arrange a one on one meet up during PAG.

title: Los Baños Hackathon 2025
description: Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This event will be June 2-6, 2025, at IRRI headquarters, in Los Baños, Philippines. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information.

title: Wittenberg Hackathon 2024
description: Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This event will be April 15-19, 2024 in Wittenberg, Germany. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information.

title: BrAPI Virtual Hackathon 2023
description: Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This virtual event will run from October 23-27, 2023. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information.

title: BrAPI Sabbaticals Demo Day
description: The 2022-2023 BrAPI Sabbatical Program has come to an end. Now it is time for the teams to show off what they were able to build in their time away. We will have a public demo session on Tuesday, June 20, at 13:00 UTC . We encourage everyone to attend if you can, or watch the recording after the session. These are some interesting projects which can be useful for the BrAPI community, and can hopefully provide inspiration for the next round of project proposals.

title: BrAPI at the AgBioData Monthly Webinar
description: AgBioData webinars are generally held on the first Wednesday of each month.

title: NAPDC Inaugural Conference
location: Nebraska Innovation Campus, Lincoln, Nebraska, USA
description: The NAPDC has been tasked by USDA NIFA to develop a framework for national cyberinfrastructure to increase production and drive innovation in agriculture. The discussion will focus on future of agricultural cyberinfrastructure and will be heard by NAPDC, USDA NIFA, other federal agencies, and stakeholder groups. The BrAPI Community will have representation at this event.

title: Greenville Hackathon
description: Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This hackathon is (hosted by Trevor Rife and Clemson University) will be in Greenville, South Carolina, USA on March 20-24, 2023. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information.

title: BrAPI at AGBT
description: BrAPI Project Coordinator Peter Selby will be presenting BrAPI at the AGBT Ag conference in San Antonio, Texas. This presentation will be a short flash talk, followed by a poster session. However, it will still provide a good networking opportunity and a chance to expand the BrAPI community. If you plan on attending AGBT, be sure to stop and say "Hi" at the BrAPI poster.

title: BrAPI Webinar - EMBL-EBI 2023 Plant Webinar Series
description: The webinar series will comprise various topics to highlights general concepts and resources useful in plant research, including comparative genomics, metagenomics, plant breeding, etc. BrAPI will be presented on Wednesday, April 26, 2023. These webinars are free and open to everyone around the world to attend.

title: BrAPI Virtual Hackathon
description: Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This virtual event will run from October 24-28, 2022. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information.

title: BrAPI Virtual Hackathon
description: Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This virtual event will run from April 25-29, 2022. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information.

title: FOSDEM 22
description: FOSDEM is a free event for software developers to meet, share ideas, and collaborate. This year, BrAPI will be presented to the open source, scientific community in a lightning talk, focusing on the development of open source standards.

title: BrAPI Virtual Hackathon
description: Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This virtual event will run from Oct 4-8, 2021. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information.

title: BOSC 2021
description: The Bioinformatics Open Source Conference (BOSC) will be July 29-30. I will be giving a short talk about BrAPI as a standard and as a community, followed by a short Q&A session. My talk has been pre-recorded, with a YouTube link below if you can't make it to the conference.

title: BrAPI Virtual Hackathon
description: Join the BrAPI community for two weeks of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This virtual event will run from March 8-19, 2021. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information.

title: Hyderabad Hackathon
description: The next BrAPI Hackathon will take place at ICRISAT Headquarters in Hyderabad, February 3rd through February 7th, 2020. Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI.

title: BrAPI At PAG: V2.0
description:
Join us in San Diego at PAG for a BrAPI community meetup on Sunday morning at the Handlery Hotel. The focus of the discussion for this meet up will be BrAPI V2.0.

Can't make it on Sunday? Don't worry, BrAPI representatives will be wandering around the convention center all week. Reach out to a BrAPI Coordinator to arrange a one on one meet up during PAG.

title: Wageningen Hackathon
description: The next BrAPI Hackathon will take place at Wageningen University & Research, April 29th through May 3rd. Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI.

title: BrAPI At PAG: Genotyping Data Structures
description:
Join us in San Diego for a BrAPI community meetup on Sunday afternoon of the PAG Conference. The focus of the discussion for this meet up will be around the genotyping data models used in BrAPI. We will be in the Crescent room (Right next to Charlie's).

Can't make it on Sunday? Don't worry, BrAPI representatives will be wandering around the convention center all week. Reach out to a BrAPI Coordinator to arrange a one on one meet up during PAG.

title: Texcoco Hackathon
description: The next BrAPI Hackathon will take place in Texcoco, Mexico, September 10th through 14th. Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI.

title: PhenoHarmonIS 2018
description: There will be several BrAPI workshops at the PhenoHarmonIS 2018 conference. Whether you are new to BrAPI or a seasoned veteran there will be something for you. Check the Event Website for more information.

title: BrAPI @ IFLRC #7
description: The 7th International Food Legume Research Conference will include a short presentation about BrAPI, and representatives for the BrAPI community will be present for the discussion forums during the event.

title: Versailles Hackathon
description:
Registration Closed

Unfortunately, the Versailles hackathon is completely full!
If you would like to be added to a waiting list please reach out to a BrAPI Coordinator

The next BrAPI Hackathon will take place in Versailles, France, on February 5th through 9th. Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI.

title: BrAPI At PAG
description:
There will be an informal BrAPI community meetup during the PAG Conference. Come meet, talk to, and network with other members in the BrAPI community. Ascot Hall (near Charlie's Bar) in the Town and Country convention center from noon to 2pm on Sunday, Jan 14.

Can't make it on Sunday? Don't worry, BrAPI representatives will be wandering around the convention center all week. Reach out to a BrAPI Coordinator to arrange a one on one meet up during PAG.

title: Seattle Hackathon
description: BrAPI Community Hackathon in Seattle.
